post.text: "I know it sometimes seems a little odd for someone running for president to say we need more love and kindness in America. But I'm telling you from the bottom of my heart, we do."

comment.author: Toni
comment.text: Its hard not to combat the hate coming from the right with equal hate....but its one thing i need to work on. I just can't wait til this is all over. ONLY LOVE CAN HEAL OUR COUNTRY NOW.

replies.author: Cheyenne
replies.text: Above and beyond the E-mail investigation, the FBI is also investigating the Clinton Foundation and Hillary Clinton specifically, for Public Corruption. Hillary Clinton is now the target of three separate FBI criminal investigations. http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2016/11/02/fbis-clinton-foundation-investigation-now-very-high-priority-sources-say.html

replies.author: Toni
replies.text: Good lord....ok great shes under investigation....let me know when they find her guilty okay. Until then go bother someone else please

replies.author: Billie Rae
replies.text: Just in on Fox News: New emails discovered! Indictment likely! Also five other countries hacked Hillary emails!! Also, did you know that Hillary and Huma knew Wiener was abusing children and did not report it, because not good politically. Oh, my God! Therefore more children were abused! Hillary does not care about our children! Hillary doesn't not care about America! Makes me sick!! Everything Hillary & media has said about Donald Trump is really who she is!! It's called projection!! Vote Trump! He will be the best president in history for everyone!!

replies.author: Morgan
replies.text: Shir-lee your candidate is corrupt. The primaries were rigged in her favor, she was given debate questions, she is being investigated by the FBI, she has done next to nothing in 30 years of public service.
